website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for a beginner's tool set. Tools fit tightly inside case while you're carrying it.
pros: Not the biggest set, but it provides the tools new homeowners will use most often for basic repairs
Interior of case is well organized, making it easy to find the exact tool you need
Nice price point to give as a gift
cons: Not aimed at those needing high quality tools
Latches on case may not last very long

customer_reviews.title: I loved this tool kit. Five stars *****
customer_reviews.text: This toolset has everything you could wish for and it is fantastic! What separates this kit from others is that it includes a 6-inch ADJUSTABLE WRENCH. Pay close attention because all other kits I compared did not have an adjustable wrench. Having the four SAE combination wrenches is something you finding most of the kits. I am pretty sure you will like to have this kit.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: it's fine. If you're buying it and have any intentions ...
customer_reviews.text: I made my girls (4 and 5 years old) a last-minute work bench as a bonus Christmas gift. I bought this set to put on the workbench. It's adequate for that purpose. No serious handy person is buying this to do real work. If you're buying it for your teenager moving into the dorms, it's fine. If you're buying it and have any intentions to do more than hang a picture or assemble some flat-pack furniture, I'd strongly encourage you go to your local big box hardware store, buy an inexpensive tool box and a hand select a few store-brand essentials. It won't cost you much more and you'll have far better results.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Maier

customer_reviews.title: All the basic tools you could need.
customer_reviews.text: It is much better than expected. It includes both AES and metric allen tools and a wrench set. This was the only product that included these at this price range. The electric control pen is also a very nice feature and works like a charm; again not very common to be included in this price range. The tools may not be industrial grade, but they are more than tough enough for home use. I also experienced some very cheap tools that you can use once or twice before they break. This set is NOT one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Hatto Kuno

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great, just average
customer_reviews.text: These are tools to fix little things around the house. It’s for the average home-owner, not someone who's a handyman/handywoman that actually knows and appreciates good tools. The case is the worst part. Two of the sections on the one I received don’t hold the tools in place; they’re way too tight. I want better tools, but since I know how expensive quality tools are, these will have to suffice for now.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Winnick

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need for my new apartment. The hammer's a little lightweight but nevertheless the perfect size for any purpose I may have, such as hanging pictures. Best of all, I like the way everything fits in its own slot, making the entire tool kit compact & easy to store. Varied sizes & varied uses. Anyone who has only an occasional need for exactly the right tool will enjoy this!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great backup toolset to have around
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tools for our church pantry. Seems like we are always needing a hammer or screwdriver and never could find them. This solved this problem. The case helps people remember to put them back and so far nothing has been left behind or lost. This is by no means a professional set but works great for small projects that come up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I've never owned a tool kit in my life nor have I ever had to put anything together. With that said, I love this tool kit!! I recently moved and had to assemble a bed frame, tv stand, small book shelf, kitchen island, light fixtures, etc. I've been able to do all that without any major issues. As for the box, I haven't found the tools to falls out but I did have to leave out the measuring tape because I couldn't seem to put it back into it's place. No big deal! I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: I came on time and was in great condition when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo son asked for this for Christmas. I came on time and was in great condition when it arrived. I marked it down to 4 stars because some of the items will not fit back in their assigned spot, namely the tape measure, and the allen wrenches don't always stay in their place. Otherwise this is a great starter set for a child OR adult. I am sure we will be using some of his tools from time to time!
customer_reviews.author: AmityJH

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Have had this set for over a year and works great! First one arrived with the screwdriver set container broken, but returned it and got a replacement no problem. Husband bought this as a gift for me, but he uses it just as much, because everything is always right where he can find it! We just use this for small home repairs and have had no problems. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cjw

customer_reviews.title: It was nice that we could ship it there by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a handyman/woman on a regular basis, this set is not meant for heavy duty repairs, just minor fixes around the house. We bought it for our rental unit for when we have to do minor repairs in between tenants, and left it in the condo for them to use. It was nice that we could ship it there by Amazon, while we flew without carrying any tools, or pay $7 for a screwdriver at the local hardware store! It is compact, easy to store, and to keep the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 1st time tool owners
customer_reviews.text: I bought one each for my college age niece and nephew who didn’t have any basic tools. This set includes all the basics plus additional useful stuff like an amp meter.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a first tool kit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved out to her own place she had no tools to hang pictures and stuff this was a way to give her simple tools to do simple tasks and to keep her organized
customer_reviews.author: Hunsakers Home Hacks

customer_reviews.title: The adjustable wrench is very poor quality and couldn't hold a nut from its first ...
customer_reviews.text: Convenient kit and case to hold tools. Could use some pliers though instead of 20 allen wrenches and precision screwdrivers. The adjustable wrench is very poor quality and couldn't hold a nut from its first use. The tape measure is very small and short and isn't something you would use for more than 3 feet or so.
customer_reviews.author: charles howell

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the case
customer_reviews.text: The tools are of good quality, and seem to be very sturdy. However, when it arrived the hex tools and one of the wrenches had fallen out of their slots in the case. These slots were too tight, we could not get the tools back into their designated places. Also, take note of the dimensions - the crescent wrench is too small for some jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: This tool box has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This tool box has everything you need. I don't always keep the little wrenches that come with furniture, but this one has not one, but two sets with a great variety of sizes. There's so many useful tools in this little tool box. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: As a beginner technician, bingo!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing number of handy tools for the price which are actually decent quality. The magnetic level, measuring tape, and precision screwdrivers are particularly ingenious add-ons. I haven't tested the digital voltage tester because I need to know precise voltages, and this thing only displays where you may be in a range of voltages. The tools all grip well and the metal seems to be high quality. I would recommend this kit for a beginner technician.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Everything Essential
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit has everything necessary to complete home fixes, test electrical wires, hang pictures, tighten loose nuts, bolts, screws, etc. The only thing I don't like is that the plastic case that the little screw drivers come in will not stay in the designated spot it continues to come loose and falls out when you open the kit..Other than that, the other tools stay in place and are sturdy in craftsman ship, now bare in mind these tools are for small jobs, I wouldn't recommend using them to build things or for big industrial jobs, but for household wear and tear they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blaz

customer_reviews.title: Apollo Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: Tool set is perfect for small jobs around the house. Has pretty much everything you'll probably need for all small house jobs. I ordered an electric drill to round out my needs. There's also a bit of a break in period, getting some of the tools out of the plastic molded case is sometimes a job on it's own. The tools feel ok, but def not on the same level as Snap-On or Craftsman, but at this price it's pretty fair. Overall it does pretty much everything it's advertised for.
customer_reviews.author: cwc

customer_reviews.title: Horrible case, acceptable tools
customer_reviews.text: The tools are mostly fine, but the case it comes in is unusable. When I opened it for the first time, half the tools were loose. I was able to get a few of them snapped back in. Some dont snap at all and are just kinda floating there, while others can't be snapped in because their slot is too tight. Worse, some are snapped in so hard I had to use other tools as leverage to get them out. Maybe mine got warped somehow? Either way, I won't be keeping the tools in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Spring for something a little better
customer_reviews.text: It's okay...but tools are short, can't get much leverage on them. If I was to do it again, I'd drop another $10-15 bucks and get something better. It does offer a good selection of tools, they are just short handled and leverage is important on these basic hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: ksw531

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tools - Dangerous tool case
customer_reviews.text: The tools are cheap but the carry case is super cheap and dangerous. The case came with several sharp/broken edges. This was not due to shipping as both outside boxes were in perfect condition. The tools are also rather hard to fit in their spaces to keep them from falling out. I had to take a file to the sharp/broken edges so that no one would get cut.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Convienient but low quality, easily breaks
customer_reviews.text: Screw Driver heads break with very little torque applied, they are junk. It is a nice convenient tool set I bought to keep in the kitchen for simple jobs around the kitchen. It works fine for that but now two of the straight blade screw driver head have broken while screwing out screws. They are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Newton

customer_reviews.title: Tools on the go
customer_reviews.text: Keep this kit in my car for any situation that may occur on the road. solid piece of tools and feels durable. No problem so far and used it a few times in the garage. Fits my need and i have it as a backup for my more heavy duty tools.
customer_reviews.author: Señor Boots

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my boyfriend who has been (not so subtlety) hinting that he wants a tool kit so he can start fixing everything that's falling apart in our house. He loves it, tools seem to be of good quality, good size box, fits well between the kitchen wall and our microwave.. Only downside is that the tools don't seem to stay in their spots. When he opened it they were all jumbled together. Hopefully that was due to shipping and won't be a regular thing..
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: RV tools
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, for any little maintenance task that may pop up in our camp trailer. I liked the assortment, and the price was right. What I didn't like, was the voltage tester that was included. Don't trust your life with it. Get a proper meter, if you do anything electrical. The rest of the set is decent, and a good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Kal El

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set for the beginning user
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for use at college. Has everything she would need. Not super high quality for an experienced user but good for the occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Knecht

customer_reviews.title: locks of the complete box are not of good quality plastic
customer_reviews.text: More than average Quality Tool Box solves indoor and outdoor requirements. Handsome variety of tools available. I have been using few times from the date of buying, found few screws do not hold tight to the magnetic holder. Secondly, locks of the complete box are not of good quality plastic. Solves the basic requirement though.
customer_reviews.author: Manas Ranjan

customer_reviews.title: got the price is a good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: got the price is a good starter kit. for the price you get what you pay for. the case works good the only concern is that the Allen wrenches do not stay in place when opening and closing but honestly not a big issue. like I said you get what you paid for. made in China so don't ecosystem to much out of it other then that great little home to set
customer_reviews.author: Anthony d r

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set for the apartment or home
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set for the apartment or home. It has the essentials for fixing the small things around the home. Brought this for a friend so they could do some of the small maintenance items around their apartment. Has all the essentials for small home maintenance task. Also good for hanging the wall mounts since it has the level for leveling the mount. Also good set of allen wrenches that will fit most of the garbage disposals so can unjam it if required.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Got purchased this for someone and they absolutely love it and using the tools often. Very durable and made of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: L McD

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: I gave for a gift and got it for free and never even used or seen contents. But it looks like it would be great if your in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the amount in the kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a tool kit for myself in my apartment. I was surprised how helpful it has been and how frequent I use it. Had more pieces than I thought I would need/expected to use but I have had everything I have needed and more. Great price for the amount in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time home owners!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy for anyone or any household. All these tools are necessary to have around the house. The tools are good sized so to not mistake it for a kid set. Each tool having a vibrant cool.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The tools are excellent for the price - inexpensive and not cheap. However, the box on the other hand...is one of the worst I've ever encountered. It does not even seem fitted to some of the tools - and is made of a fairly pliable plastic...so if you force a tool back into it's slot and bend the plastic, it is bent forever. Warning: You *can* injure yourself putting tools back into the box - particularly with the screwdriver bits...they require an immense amount of force to put them back into their spot in this box.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the price. I wanted a tool set for use around my apartment and this definitely gets the job done. Pretty much anything you could need for the basic, everyday type activities. My only complaint is that some of my tools do not stay in place and when I open it they will have moved around or fall out which is very annoying, but I can deal with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rns

customer_reviews.title: Second set of common tools handy or for apartment dwellers
customer_reviews.text: Its a good inexpensive but decent set of common tails for light things around the home and has a good assortment -Tape measure Electric outlet tester and for hanging a picture or fighting that bathroom toilet holder all you need is this and the hardware . Keep one upstairs instead of going down or out to the tool shed/basement workbench for everyday quick fixes. Great for those ion an apartment that hate the drawer full of tools and screws falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Roboman

customer_reviews.title: Usable
customer_reviews.text: Has everything but the case it comes in can sometimes not close completely and some items won’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The only bad think is how they locked in their place
customer_reviews.text: So far I tried few tools and there are no questions to their quality. The only bad think is how they locked in their place. Sometimes it is hard to take or put it back. But because I use they occasionally it is not problem for me
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Cheverdyuk

customer_reviews.title: and the hammer seems like it would break under my kind of use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife who was constantly borrowing my tools. Pleasantly surprised by the apparent quality of the parts. Loses a star for the low quality of the case, and the hammer seems like it would break under my kind of use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wade

customer_reviews.title: decent tool set
customer_reviews.text: Could be of higher quality. but you get what you pay for. nice for around the house or even as a emergency kit in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for.. the tools dont really snap back into place without extreme force.. or the plastic sinks in
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: very cool
customer_reviews.text: very cool tool box tools are quality made there not cheap tools cheaply made no the price was not bad either I would recommend these tools
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a really good tool kit but sometimes is so difficult to get the da** things out. Another thing, I have trouble closing all for locks of the case and it looks much much neater in the picture than in real life. One last thing, it is amazing how small the kit is, it does not occupy any space! Other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco A. Layrisse

customer_reviews.title: Got this small kit for my boyfriend. He loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this small kit for my boyfriend. He loves it. It has everything he needs in it to do small repairs around our apartment instead of bothering maintenance for small jobs here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny BothersTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Even though this is an "economical" set, the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is an "economical" set, the quality of the tools, especially the screw heads, is disappointing. If using a screw head on something difficult to unscrew, it will ruin the head. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: G. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Needed a small cheap tool set that was the right size to fit in my truck
customer_reviews.text: Needed a generic tool kit to have on hand for those little jobs. Not the highest of quality but gets the job done when a small task or job crops up unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for minor repairs
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set to have. Comes with just about every thing you need for minor repairs. I didn't have trouble with the case like a lot of reviews did. Nice buy
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: All i need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool kit to go in a rv......i like the variety of tools in the kit......i did have to add a square bit since i was putting this in a rv.... i think it will be all i ever need for minor emergency repairs
customer_reviews.author: tmhtim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband, he loved it and has been using them to fix a few things. Should have bought it sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very handy. Have mounted on inside shed door. Saves on trips to garage every time I need a tool.
customer_reviews.author: deej

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs around your house
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! This set gives me all I need for apartment living. I don't need all the bells and whistles that some kits have. This one is perfect for me. I have everything I need for small jobs around the apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, and slightly damaged when it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, and slightly damaged when it arrived, box was in less than acceptable condition. But for its price range and the amount of tools it offers, you cannot complain. The tools themselves while cheap to the feel, operate very well and can take a beating. Ive used it from computer repair to desk building. I give it 4 stars because 1 strike for lack of storage care as it arrived with the small screw driver kit inside completely shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: A great little toolkit.
customer_reviews.text: Not really little, Apollo managed to provide quality tools for a great price. The value is awesome. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for a quick grab household tool set. Purchased for my daughter who is tool challenged. This set has just about anyone would need for a quick assembly or tightening. The hammer is smaller than normal but it works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Customer

customer_reviews.title: all the right pieces but not stored in an efficient way
customer_reviews.text: Package seemed nice until I opened it, all parts were there but plastic piece covering small screwdrivers was cracked and once opened nothing seemed to stay in place to close back up neatly which is a shame. Keeping because it has all the necessary tools but I wish that it was better fitted to keep everything in place
customer_reviews.author: Shizam

customer_reviews.title: Tools themselves appear cheaply made and poor quality. Tried contacting their customer service and recieved ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arived partially open with grease and oil inside. Came with a ripped piece of paper inside it coveted in brown finger prints. Tools themselves appear cheaply made and poor quality. Tried contacting their customer service and recieved no reply. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shiela

customer_reviews.title: Snug as a bug in a too-big rug.
customer_reviews.text: The tools seem to be decent quality. However the description on Amazon is incorrect. The case measures 10" x 13" x 3" rather than 8x13x3. One of the reasons I purchased this set is because I thought it would fit inside my main toolbox. The extra 2" width makes it just slightly too big. My only other complaint is that the tools fit REALLY snugly inside the case. I had to pry the measuring tape out with one of the wrenches just to measure the dimensions. So I'm sending this set back.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Van Boening

customer_reviews.title: Tools don't fit in box
customer_reviews.text: While the tools themselves seem nice enough, some of them do not fit into the toolbox securely unless you push really hard against the plastic - and then good luck getting them out when you need to! The point of a toolbox is to keep all your tools in a nice organized manner, which this one does not accomplish. It's not worth the hassle to return it, but be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Nice

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit has all the basics for household needs. I like having every thing together in one place and easy to find with one glance after opening. I've used most of the tools and they work fine. The case could use a little improvement. Some tools stay in their designated space too well and have to be pryed out and others fall out and won't stay in. For the price, it's a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Ovieda Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good product. As described and I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Nice return on the money.
customer_reviews.text: The tools are not amazing, but quite good. People complain about the box, but it's to be expected. Cheap plastic box after all. The tools do the job nicely, and you can always move them to a proper tool box. All in all, a good set for the apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit with a nice selection of tools
customer_reviews.text: Great toolkit with a nice selection of tools. So far I've used it to assemble my bike, install accessories and assemble furniture! Sturdy tools, will last a long while!
customer_reviews.author: Rajagopal

customer_reviews.title: Good for Everything
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a tool kit my Mom could use that had everything she might need to help with the basic projects around the house. She lives alone so I wanted to ensure she could still be independent if something broke. This tool kit was perfect to help keep her organized.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Kessener

customer_reviews.title: good tool box
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool kit with quality tools (for the price). A pair of standard pliers (not just needle-nose) would have made it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Case and tools are cheap but everything is there
customer_reviews.text: Cheap feeling plastic case and tools are not the highest quality, however this tool set has everything I need for small jobs around my office. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christo

customer_reviews.title: Good low priced tool kit for a college dorm or apartment
customer_reviews.text: Good low priced tool kit for a college dorm or apartment. This isn't high quality to use in a shop or very often, but good enough to have on hand when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Smells of mold
customer_reviews.text: The kit is ok but it smells of mold so bad you cant even open the case. I may just throw away smells so bad it stinks up the whole house when you open the case.
customer_reviews.author: NYR717

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for household use.
customer_reviews.text: Holds up for household use, nice to have this set in the house so I don't have to go digging through the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Ben McEwen

customer_reviews.title: Handy kit to have around the house!
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 sets of these and they are meant to be a handy household tool set, perfect for the wife. These are obviously not intended for heavy construction or serious jobs around the house, you should have manly tools for that. My wife absolutely loves this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amznlve

customer_reviews.title: The tools are fine, but the case is very bad
customer_reviews.text: The tools are fine, but the case is very bad. There was a hole left of the wrench -- defected molding process. The edges are all sharp all the way around. It hurts my fingers to open the tabs. I'll have to take the tools out & store in a tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Ink

customer_reviews.title: great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a female homeowner, it has any tool I could possibly need! I love the great, sturdy carrying case, too! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in the house instead of having to go to the garage every time I need a simple tool. The quality is good and the assortment is perfect for quick repairs. The case is a definite plus. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: compman

customer_reviews.title: haven't heard if it was a good one. Hope so
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift...haven't heard if it was a good one. Hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hardinger

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time toolbox owner
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like image. This toolbox is a great as a gift for someone who needs a toolbox but not sure what to get. This has everything they need and anything extra can be purchased individually and most likely be a more inexpensive grand total but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I just wish I had bought the one that had the electric drill with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Fletchall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for apartment or new home owner.
customer_reviews.text: My second set. Quality is good for the value. Great for apartment or new home owner.
customer_reviews.author: R-V S.

customer_reviews.title: It is ok.
customer_reviews.text: It is ok with most tools but not showing a very good quality observing from the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great basic toolkit
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted my tools kept together nicely so they would not get lost. This has everything I need for small houseshold jobs and the case keeps it all neat and handy.
customer_reviews.author: starcooks

customer_reviews.title: Really Handy
customer_reviews.text: Nice Tool set really handy. Partner really like it but I was expecting the hammer to be a bit bigger. The case is a bit tight to take out and put the tools in but can't really complain for a little over 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone who doesn't use tools a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, and had it directly shipped to my sister. She loved it. Said it has been a great set. Held up great-except for the pieces her DH has taken out, and have never made it back. Otherwise, has ben a great set, for someone who needs basic tools around.
customer_reviews.author: Andra Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my dad a long time ago and it still works great. Has everything we need. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Montero

customer_reviews.title: One huge turn off is that the case is complete garbage. Most of the tools barely fit in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The tools have signs of wear but are fully functional. One huge turn off is that the case is complete garbage. Most of the tools barely fit in the slots in the case. Everything falls out every time I try to close it. The tools are OK for a starter kit but you should assume that the case is essentially worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Choy

customer_reviews.title: It's a good value, and has all the tools you could ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value, and has all the tools you could need for a household tool kit. The reason I chose this one over others is because this one had the small screwdriver kit. The quality could definitely be better, especially with the box everything is stored in, but it's not like I'm not planning on building a house with this tool kit for (thus, the quality isn't as necessary).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool set, nothing to complain about, nothing has broken or fallen apart and it is the perfect little tool set for standard house repairs
customer_reviews.author: Nico B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kit, easier than hauling around my heavy tool bag with my professional tools. Cute little hammer!
customer_reviews.author: Scrim

customer_reviews.title: One of the best online purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best online purchases I've ever made. One time my girlfriend drove her van over this box and I was scared that everything would be crushed. The box had a small scratch on it and everything was in tact. The only damage internally was the plastic mini box that holds the eyeglass screws was cracked but I would take that story over a non-cracked eyeglass screw box any day.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for our truck. Now I don't have to worry about not having basic tools when we're traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Glenn Delaney

customer_reviews.title: It will get the job done, but is of a poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It has all the basic pieces for doing basic repairs and handywork in the home, however, the quality is very low. I would get a higher quality kit with fewer tools or pay somewhat more money.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz Cerazy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my girlfriend and she really loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and she really loves it. Now she doesn't have to ask her brother were the tools are and she does a lot of her own handy work around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Level was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality everything. The level is completely off. I installed several shelves that were noticeably crooked before realizing that it was this crappy level that wasn't working.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her day and he loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact and there when ready. Customer support from Apollo also proved accessible.
customer_reviews.author: wil blake

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just the right size and equipment that I needed. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amous

customer_reviews.title: used it already!
customer_reviews.text: its a really handy and sturdy set. i received it on a wednesday and that next day i took my boys bunk beds apart cause it was getting too wobbly and unsafe.. so i had no problem! i had a tool for everything and the quality is really nice. i would buy it again for that price.
customer_reviews.author: JR1983

customer_reviews.title: great for college
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son in college. It's not a great set, but for the price was handy for him. It's a decent starter set. I liked that the tools had their own place slots. We did have some trouble getting the wrenches back in once out, but I figure it may loosen up in time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent starter kit! My husband absolutely loves it! It is the perfect kit that has most things needed to take care of stuff around the house! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: The most handy tool kit ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a single do it yourself mom and this tool kit has helped me so much. It is easy to store and has so many tools. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: CESA

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool kit.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool kit, everything you need in one space. Sturdy case, with easy to open flaps. All the tools contained within are of good sturdy quality, should last for sometime allowing me to get all the small household projects completed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The Complete Necessities
customer_reviews.text: This little tool kit is ideal for a small apartment or condo as it has the essentials for handling small repairs one faces around the home. The tools are of good quality and I would recommend this kit to a friend. Remember it contains the basics from which you can build upon.
customer_reviews.author: Manch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The case was terrible - thing falling out and barely fitting in their proper location. The small screwdriver case does not fit properly in the case and mine came broken. Returned this, then went to Home Depot and got a 11 dollar set which does what I needed. You should do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Asif Bhimani

product_meta.title: Apollo Tools DT9408 53 Piece Household Tool Set with Wrenches, Precision Screwdriver Set and Most Reached for Hand Tools in Storage Case
product_meta.description:
Fixing that leaky faucet, hanging picture frames, assembling furniture, tightening bicycle chains, here’s the right tool kit for all those jobs around the house. This versatile kit contains 53 of the most-reached-for hand tools for tackling all assembly, maintenance, repair projects around the home or office. If you buy all these tools individually at the hardware store, you'll easily pay twice as much. Tools are heat treated for strength and durability. All tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards. Convenient carrying case. Sturdy interior keeps tools in place. Lifetime Warranty. Amazon.com Fixing that leaky faucet, hanging picture frames, assembling furniture, tightening bicycle chains, here?s the right tool kit for all those jobs around the house. This versatile kit contains 53 of the most-reached-for hand tools for tackling all assembly, maintenance, repair projects around the home or office. If you buy all these tools individually at the hardware store, you'll easily pay twice as much. Long nose pliers easily reach into tight quarters and clamp down on small objects. An adjustable crescent wrench turns nuts and bolts of various sizes. A handy claw hammer pulls nails and pounds small to medium-size nails into studs for hanging pictures, mirrors, shelving and more. The kit?s digital voltage tester helps with wiring and testing appliances. A tape measure helps you size things up. And, a magnetic level holds fast to metal surfaces for hands-free leveling operations. The kit also includes precision screwdrivers, a bit driver, bits, SAE combination wrenches, SAE hex keys, and metric hex keys. Tools are constructed of 45C carbon steel or chrome vanadium steel, heat treated and chrome plated where appropriate to resist corrosion. The tool handles are made of double dipped plastics for a comfortable and secure grip and the tool cases are made of extra heavy duty materials. Tools meet or exceed critical ANSI standards. Each tool is tested against industry standards for hardness, torque, finish and usability and should last a lifetime under normal use. Tools are held securely in a sturdy blow molded case. --Brian D. Olson What?s in the Box 6-inch long nose pliers, 6-inch adjustable wrench, claw hammer, digital voltage tester, 12-foot tape measure, 9-inch magnetic level, six precision screwdrivers, bit driver, twenty 1-inch bits, four SAE combination wrenches, eight SAE hex keys, eight metric hex keys See all Product description

AMAZON.COM
Fixing that leaky faucet, hanging picture frames, assembling furniture, tightening bicycle chains, here’s the right tool kit for all those jobs around the house. This versatile kit contains 53 of the most-reached-for hand tools for tackling all assembly, maintenance, repair projects around the home or office. If you buy all these tools individually at the hardware store, you'll easily pay twice as much. 

 Long nose pliers easily reach into tight quarters and clamp down on small objects. An adjustable crescent wrench turns nuts and bolts of various sizes. A handy claw hammer pulls nails and pounds small to medium-size nails into studs for hanging pictures, mirrors, shelving and more. The kit’s digital voltage tester helps with wiring and testing appliances. A tape measure helps you size things up. And, a magnetic level holds fast to metal surfaces for hands-free leveling operations. The kit also includes precision screwdrivers, a bit driver, bits, SAE combination wrenches, SAE hex keys, and metric hex keys. 

 Tools are constructed of 45C carbon steel or chrome vanadium steel, heat treated and chrome plated where appropriate to resist corrosion. The tool handles are made of double dipped plastics for a comfortable and secure grip and the tool cases are made of extra heavy duty materials. Tools meet or exceed critical ANSI standards. Each tool is tested against industry standards for hardness, torque, finish and usability and should last a lifetime under normal use. Tools are held securely in a sturdy blow molded case. --Brian D. Olson 

 What’s in the Box
6-inch long nose pliers, 6-inch adjustable wrench, claw hammer, digital voltage tester, 12-foot tape measure, 9-inch magnetic level, six precision screwdrivers, bit driver, twenty 1-inch bits, four SAE combination wrenches, eight SAE hex keys, eight metric hex keys

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This 53 piece household tool kit contains all the tools necessary for most household projects. Tools are heat treated and chrome plated to resist corrosion. The tools are contained in a sturdy blow molded case with a built in carrying handle for convenient storage. Contains: 6-Inch long nose pliers, 6-Inch adjustable wrench, 8 oz claw hammer, digital voltage tester, 12 ft. tape measure, 9-Inch magnetic level, six precision screwdrivers - Phillips #1, # 0, slotted 1.4mm, 2mm, 2.4mm, 3mm. Also contains a bit driver, ten 1-Inch bits - 1/8-Inch, 5/32-Inch, 3/16-Inch, 1/4-Inch, PH1, PH2, PH3, PZ1, PZ2 and PZ3. Ten 1-Inch bits - T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, 30, 1/8-Inch, 5/32-Inch, 3/16-Inch, 1/4-Inch, four SAE combination wrenches - 7/16-Inch, 1/2-Inch, 9/16-Inch and 5/8-Inch; eight SAE Hex keys - 1/16-Inch, 5/64-Inch, 3/32-Inch, 1/8-Inch, 5/32-Inch, 3/16-Inch, 7/32-Inch, 1/4-Inch; eight metric Hex keys - 1.5mm, 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 5.5mm, 6mm.

See more
feature_bullets: MOST USED DIY REPAIR HAND TOOLS: A clever selection of most commonly reached for tools used for repair and maintenance tasks around the home, office, garage and yard.

MULTI PURPOSE: Whether it is picture hanging, working with screws, cutting, measuring, and assembling furniture, this tool set has you covered. It also has perfect tools for computer, small engine or bike repairs.

PRACTICAL HEAVY DUTY TOOLS: Includes a claw hammer with rubber grip, adjustable wrench for tackling the most stubborn nuts and bolts, long nose pliers with hardened blade to cut wire and fasteners, and wrenches for gripping and turning nuts and bolts.

APOLLO HAND TOOL LIFETIME QUALITY GUARANTEE: Tools are manufactured from high-grade steel alloy, chrome plated to resist corrosion, with non-slip comfort grip handles for extra torque, and will last a lifetime under normal use.
STURDY COMPACT STORAGE CASE: Tools are neatly stored in a sturdy case that keeps them secure, clean, organized and easy to find.
